title: 24- Taking the Fifth
description: Trump has said the taking the fifth makes "you look guilty as hell" but lot of Trump's associates are now taking the fifth in the Russia investigation. How should we interpret people taking the fifth?
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
